name: all_date
description: This table provides a comprehensive breakdown of date-related information, useful for time-based analysis and reporting.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year component of the date.

columns.name: month_no
columns.description: The numeric representation of the month.

columns.name: month_name
columns.description: The textual name of the month.

columns.name: month_year
columns.description: The combination of month and year in a single string.

columns.name: week_no
columns.description: The numeric representation of the week within the year.

columns.name: week_year
columns.description: The combination of week and year in a single string.

columns.name: week_day_no
columns.description: The numeric representation of the day within the week.

columns.name: week_day_name
columns.description: The textual name of the day within the week.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The numeric representation of the day within the month.

columns.name: day_month
columns.description: The combination of day and month in a single string.
